moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 d6 3. d4 Nd7 4. dxe5 dxe: Routine play up to here, But now, Instead, 11 a4 was better.
moves.11... b5 12. Bb3 a5 13. a3 Re8 14. Qe2 N: Black wants to free e7 for the Q and exploit dark square weaknesses.
moves.20. Kg2: ?? The worst place to move the King...
moves.20... Ngf4+: White resigns, since if the N is taken the second fork wins the Q.
